configs.additionalSettings: {"trackOnly":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"","matchGroupToUse":"","versionDetection":true,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"apkFilterRegEx":"","invertAPKFilter":false,"autoApkFilterByArch":true,"appName":"Telegram","appAuthor":"Telegram","shizukuPretendToBeGooglePlay":false,"allowInsecure":false,"exemptFromBackgroundUpdates":false,"skipUpdateNotifications":false,"about":"Telegram is a cloud-based mobile and desktop messaging app with a focus on security and speed.","refreshBeforeDownload":false}

description.en: Telegram is a cloud-based mobile and desktop messaging app with a focus on security and speed.
description.de: Telegram ist eine Cloud-basierte Smartphone- und Desktop-Messaging-App mit Schwerpunkt auf Sicherheit und Geschwindigkeit.
